member.name: T:DinoDiner.Menu.Entrees.Brontowurst
member.summary: Implement a class to represent the Brontowurst entree. Its price is $5.36, it contains 498 calories, and its ingredients are: brautwurst, whole-wheat bun, peppers, and onions. It should implement methods for holding the bun, peppers, and onions.

member.name: T:DinoDiner.Menu.Entrees.DinoNuggets

member.summary: Gives list of all the ingredients in this entree.

member.summary: Initialize price to 4.25, nuggets to 6, and calories to 6*59.

member.name: M:DinoDiner.Menu.Entrees.DinoNuggets.AddNugget
member.summary: Adds another chicken nugget to the order.

member.summary: Implement a class to represent the T-Rex King Burger entree. Its price is $8.45, it contains 728 calories, and its ingredients are: a whole wheat bun, three steakburger patties, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, ketchup, mustard, and mayo. It should implement methods for holding the bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, ketchup, mustard, and mayo.
